name: Snackdown - Frozen Desert Expansion
summary: Your journey has not ended yet! Upon the frozen soil you now tread! Go out of the arena and into public with your fighting prowess! Take flight to New Mewaii, a hostile environment where everything has frozen over! Talk to the inhabitants and pick fights in this new expansion to Snackdown! Including a new area with new fights, quests and minigames!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020年04月01日
  • 售价: free
  • 开发: Symbol
